snippet: President Bashar al-Assad’s visit to the city of Daraya, once an insurgent stronghold, was intended to honor the nation’s soldiers and highlight the progress against the rebels seeking to oust him.
abstract: Syrian Pres Bashar al-Assad lauds his troops and vows that they will be victorious during visit to city of Daraya, heavily damaged Damascus suburb; at same time, anti-government activists say a rebel attack detonated weapons depot in Homs, killings dozens of people.
lead_paragraph: President Bashar al-Assad’s visit to the city of Daraya, once an insurgent stronghold, was intended to honor the nation’s soldiers and highlight the progress against the rebels seeking to oust him.

headline.main: While Praising Troops, Assad Promises Victory
headline.print_headline: While Praising Troops, Assad Promises Victory
